## How Arsenal, Liverpool, and Manchester City Secured Last 16 Spots
The Champions League has reached its critical stage, with several Premier League teams vying for a spot in the coveted last 16. As the dust settles, Arsenal, Liverpool, Spurs, Chelsea, and Manchester City have all secured their places in the next round, ensuring an exciting and potentially dramatic knockout stage.

## The Road to the Knockouts: A Look Back at the Group Stage
The group stage of the Champions League has been nothing short of thrilling, with several teams facing off in high-stakes matches. The likes of Arsenal, Liverpool, and Manchester City have all demonstrated their prowess, navigating their respective groups with ease. Meanwhile, teams like Spurs and Chelsea have had to fight tooth and nail to secure their spots, showcasing the resilience and determination that defines the Premier League.
